00022     upk_error_t __upk_error_type = 0; \
00023     char UPK_ERRMSG[UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN] = {0}
00024 
00025 #define UPK_FUNC_ASSERT(A,B) do { if(! (A)) { __upk_error_type = B; goto __upk_err; } } while(0)
00026 #define UPK_FUNC_ASSERT_MSG(A,B,...) \
00027     do { if(! (A)) { snprintf(UPK_ERRMSG, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN, __VA_ARGS__); __upk_error_type = B; goto __upk_err; } } while(0)

00030     __upk_err: \
00031     if(*UPK_ERRMSG && __upk_error_type) upk_report_error_msg(__upk_error_type, (unsigned char *) UPK_ERRMSG); \
